patterns: what programs are offered by Chandigarh University
which programs are offered by CU
how many programs does CU offer
responses: Basically CU offers 129 programs. For more info check here
You can see fee structure for all the courses here

patterns: How do I get to chandigarh university
responses: You can reach the location of Chandigarh University using the map given here:

patterns: Where should i get a student Identification Card?
when should i get my ID Card
how do I get my ID card?
I did not get an ID card
responses: Student identification card will be provided by your respective class teachers on orientation day of Chandigarh University

patterns: How do I get a new Id card?
how to get new Id card
I want a new Id card
I lost my Id card what do I do
responses: To get a new ID card issued you have to contact the student welfare department.
Sure, we offer counseling services for our students on first floor of Admission block
You can get all the details of our counselling session on CU official site click here:

patterns: what are the criteria for attendance
how much attendance do i need
responses: You have to maintain 75% attendance throughout the semester and you can see your attendance on C.U.I.M.S. by simply navigating to ACADEMICS>MY ATTENDANCE

patterns: what are the facilities on campus
What amenities are provided by Chandigarh University
responses: The facilities provided by Chandigarh University are a Library, Cafeteria, Hostel, Sport Complex, Labs, Moot Court, Design Studio, Gym, Hospital/Medical, Wifi, Shuttle Service, Auditorium, Music Room, Dance Room, Convenience Store and many more
CUCET is an Entrance Test for admission to Engineering and Management programmes in Chandigarh University
CUCET is also a Scholarship Test aimed at rewarding the potential of young aspirants to win scholarships and study in courses of their choice

patterns: How is the placement at CU
responses: We witnessed a growth of 30% in number of Multi-Nationals visiting the campus for recruitment of fresh talent.For more info check here
Our top Recruiters are Google, Microsoft, Amazon, Flipkart, cognizant, samsung etc. For more info check here

patterns: where can I find you online
responses: You can contact us on facebook,instagram and twitter here facebook, Instagram,Twitter

patterns: how do I see my syllabus?
where do i get my syllabus
where can i find my syllabus
responses: For syllabus go to your C.U.I.M.S. account and then Navigate to Academics>Scheme & Syllabus

patterns: where can i see my timetable
what's the timing of my classes
where can i see schedule of my full day classes
what are the courses do we have this semester
responses: For Course and Timetable related info go to your C.U.I.M.S. account and then Navigate to Academics>My Timetable

patterns: where can I see my marks
how do I check my exam results
responses: You can see your exam results on C.U.I.M.S. by going to Examination>Results
You can see your marks on C.U.I.M.S. by going to Examination>Student Marks View
You can contact your Class Representative or Mentor to get in touch with us!

patterns: where can I find my datesheet
how do I see my datesheet
responses: You can find your datesheet on C.U.I.M.S. by going to Examination>My Date Sheet

patterns: where can i upload my assignment
where can i see my submitted assignment
where do I submit my assignment
responses: You can submit your Assignment on C.U.I.M.S. by going to Academics>Assignment upload

patterns: where should i apply for leave
how do I apply for DL?
How do I apply for a holiday
responses: You can apply for leave on C.U.I.M.S. by going to Academics > Student leave application
To know leave policy go to student leave application inside the academics by logging  to C.U.I.M.S.

patterns: where can i give my feedback
responses: For feedback Chandigarh University gives True Opinion Platform to the Class Representative. You can also access True Opinion Platform by going to your C.U.I.M.S.->Academics

patterns: how to do online payment of fee
how to pay semester fee online
responses: For online fee payment first login to C.U.I.M.S. account then navigate to Accounts tab

patterns: how do I pay my of semester fee on campus
how do I pay my fees offline
How do I pay my dues offline
responses: For offline fee payment you have to go Block- 3
Please visit Block-3 to see pay your dues on campus

patterns: How do I apply for ICTS services
How do I apply for OIR services
How do I apply for semester exchange program
responses: You can take benefits of ICTS and OIR services by going to Administration on C.U.I.M.S. account

patterns: Where can i see the career option
I want to register for career option
how to register for different career option
where we can register for career option
responses: For registration of career option go to your C.U.I.M.S. account and navigate to Career options by DCPD

patterns: How do I join a club?
responses: You may visit the Department of Student Welfare in Block-3 for information regarding participation in club activities

patterns: how we can give practice tests
where do i have to give practice test of my courses
How do I attempt a mock test
responses: You can give a mock test of any subject on C.U.I.M.S. by going to Examination->Mock test

patterns: where can we check our profile
How do I access my profile information
how do I see my profile?
responses: You can see your profile on C.U.I.M.S. by going to the profile tab on the navigation bar

patterns: where do i go to see any announcement
how do I see my annouuncements
responses: You can check Announcements on the homepage of your C.U.I.M.S. account

patterns: how i can check particular book is in library or not
how can I get a book from the library
how to issue books from library
How do I issue a book
responses: After login  to C.U.I.M.S. you can search books in Library books (OPAC) inside the Library tab
For issuing a book you need your library card and ID card

patterns: I want to know the credits system
How many credits we have to collect
responses: Students have to complete 4 credit(1 Credit=15hrs) in every year by doing 60 hours courses from NPTEL, coursera, internshala

patterns: how i can show my talent
where can i show my talent
what i have to do to show my talent
responses: If you have talent you can register on C.U.I.M.S. by going to System>Talent Search program

patterns: Do you have a hostel in campus
Do you have accomodation facility in the campus?
responses: Yes! Our campus has separate hostels for both boys and girls.

patterns: What is provided in the hostel facility?
responses: Some of the facilities are 24/7 power supply, wifi/internet services, gym, volley-ball court, basket-ball court, badminton court etc.

Massive Open Online Courses (MOOCs) are free online courses available for anyone to enroll. MOOCs provide an affordable and flexible way to learn new skills, advance your career and deliver quality educational experiences at scale.

responses: To apply for admission in Chandigarh University click here.

patterns: what is the motto of chandigarh university
responses: The motto of Chandigarh University is to Discover. Learn . Empower.
